message.content:
cs.CR, cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.HC

The paper discusses a method for hiding information in public displays, which falls under the category of information security and cryptography (cs.CR). The method involves using a private marking system, which is a technique commonly used in multimedia steganography (cs.MM) such as image and video steganography. The paper also mentions the use of electronic advertising boards, which can be classified under computer vision (cs.CV) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the method is intended for public announcements, which involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
